alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, southwestern Jefferson and southeastern Leon Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 415 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Woodville to 10 miles east of St. Marks. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Newport, Cody, Hells Half Acre, Fanlew, Wacissa Springs, Natural Bridge and Plum Orchard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon
